flawed_nl_solution:
The difference in age between Joel and his dad is 32 - 5 = <<32-5=30>>30 years.
When you double this gap in years, you have 30 x 2 = <<30*2=60>>60.
When his dad is 60, Joel will be 60 / 2 = <<60/2=30>>30 years old.
#### 30

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 30. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
